amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General to report on the effectiveness of coordination of health care services provided to Indians using Federal, State local and tribal funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3898 proposed by Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S961-962; text: CR S961) To require the Comptroller General to report on the effectiveness of coordination of health care services provided to Indians using Federal, State local and tribal funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3898 proposed by Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3899.
